full_summary:
#TBIPS B.3 Business Consultant-Level 3 - Solicitation #149

##Job Description
This tender is open to pre-qualified Indigenous suppliers through the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) contract. 

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of one (1) Business Consultant, Level 3, for an estimated period of August 31st, 2023 until March 31st, 2024. 

Work Locations:
- Remote work is accepted, subject to occasional on-site work at:
  * National Defence Headquarters, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario
  * National Capital Region (NCR)

##Security Requirements
Security Clearance required:
- Reliability

Document Safeguarding:
- None

##Pre-Qualification Requirements
Native Canadian companies must be pre-qualified under TBIPS to submit a proposal. Pre-qualified suppliers can be found at: [Insert Google link to listing]

##Bid Submission
Bid documents can be downloaded from the Government E-Tendering System (Buy and Sell). Suppliers are advised that bid documents may not be available in the Government E-Tendering System.

##Contact Information
Liam O'Toole
Phone: (613) 794-8299
Email: admdiaprocurement-approvisionnementsmadia@forces.gc.ca

Note: I tried to summarize and reword the text while maintaining accuracy and focus on the necessary information for a professional tender announcement. Let me know if you need further assistance!  We are within the 400 words limit.
